node.name: Twitterclipse
node.shortdescription:
A plugin to handle your twitter account


Version 0.7.5


  • Supports multiple twitter accounts. Easyily switch between your account over the twitterclipse preference page


Version 0.7.3


  • updated oauth-supports OAuth1.0a / PIN-based authentication

  • you can now follow users when you make a query

  • you can stop following your friend over the context menu at the friends view
node.body:
A plugin to handle your twitter account


Version 0.7.5


  • Supports multiple twitter accounts. Easyily switch between your account over the twitterclipse preference page


Version 0.7.3


  • updated oauth-supports OAuth1.0a / PIN-based authentication

  • you can now follow users when you make a query

  • you can stop following your friend over the context menu at the friends view
